name: Inbox Zero (Florence Smith Nicholls)
description:
Inbox Zero is an epistolary piece of interactive fiction told through a series
of emails. An old friend is embarking on a new life as part of a co-operative
community based on the island of St Jude. The inhabitants are aiming to live as sustainably as possible, repurposing the existing derelict buildings.

The trouble is, the island is haunted, and so are your emails.

---

This game was originally produced for the Green Stories Interactive Fiction competition and was one of the top 10 entries.
